title: Arhats, from an album of paintings
description: bald man wearing large gold hoop earrings and a red robe, riding on a fantastic animal with a short tail, six-point horns, split hooves and curly brown hair, at right; smaller standing figure accompanied by a fantastic peacock-like bird; standing man carries a small tree (?) with red and brown branches and holds a red staff with feathers at top
creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
